channel.title: [Turbo] Popcorn Turbo (0/?) [Postponed]
channel.description:
# Popcorn Turbo Mafia (By yours truly)
### Rules Be nice and follow global forum rules and uh common sense
### Gameplay Days will be 10 minutes long or shorter if someone is shot There is no night At the start of the game mafia choose one person to be the gunbearer The gunbearer has a gun, is confirmed town, and can shoot a player using the command **/shoot (player)** If the gunbearer shoots town they die and their target becomes the gunbearer If the gunbearer shoots scum the scum dies and they live If the gunbearer hasn’t shot anyone in 8 minutes they die and mafia picks a new gunbearer There are no lynches The gunbearer is always announced and confirmed town
### To Join To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
### Rolelist: Everyone is vanilla.
Players:

item.title: [Turbo] Popcorn Turbo (0/?) [Postponed]
item.dc:creator: Jane
item.description:
Popcorn Turbo Mafia

(By yours truly)

Rules

Be nice and follow global forum rules and uh common sense

Gameplay

Days will be 10 minutes long or shorter if someone is shot
There is no night
At the start of the game mafia choose one person to be the gunbearer
The gunbearer has a gun, is confirmed town, and can shoot a player using the command /shoot (player)
If the gunbearer shoots town they die and their target becomes the gunbearer
If the gunbearer shoots scum the scum dies and they live
If the gunbearer hasn’t shot anyone in 8 minutes they die and mafia picks a new gunbearer
There are no lynches
The gunbearer is always announced and confirmed town

To Join

To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like “I want to join” or “/join” or “/in” or “sign me up, coach” or whatever you want

Rolelist:

Everyone is vanilla.

Players:

Read full topic
